> Grimlock looked Legacy and said "Is a oldy MAximal, but havent seen 
> ina while"

Legacy's optic flickered thoughtfully for a moment before he spoke, "CLARIFY." Legacy removed what appeared to be some sort of peresonal imaging device and looked at it as he spoke to Grimlock, "THE DESIGNATION MEGATRON HAS ALWAYS REFERRED TO A  DECEPTICON OR PREDICON LEADER." Legacy look back at Grimlock, "HOW IS IT THAT THIS 'MEGATRON X' IS NOT THE SAME?"

(TAG: Grimlock)

Preston
